text: 1.5-6: FG 16.1; 1 T 1.5; 4.61.5-6: 1 Te 5.19; 1 T 4.14Gu guigira khueŋ kaŋgi, ndun nzɨk Rois gum ndu niamuuŋ Unis, mani fhum guigira Krais khothɨgi tɨvara muuŋgiap, ndu Krais khothɨgi. Ndu khaŋ tɨgap havhargiap guigira Zisas khothɨgi tɨv, gu ana ndɨkndɨgap, gu ndu ndɨkndɨga khavi. Ndu mba Fhe Bakɨme won ŋaara muun zav fhura ndu nɨɨŋgi bigɨn, ana khaŋ tɨgɨp havhargip ndun kɨri. Mba bigɨn, ana khaŋ muuŋgip ndun kɨri, guma vhav shiav kim, ana wom ana beregi, ana fogap kɨvgi fara muuŋgi. Gu mba farver ndu khɨngim, Fhe Bakɨme fhura ndu nɨɨŋgi ŋkasŋka, gu ana nzuai.
